entry.title:
[FF] "The first step in escaping a prison is realizing you're in a prison."
"...Why
entry.content:
"The first step in escaping a prison is realizing you're in a prison."
"...Why would the simulation want me to punch a baby?"
Auralnauts Star Wars: [Existential Stormtroopers episode 1](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gKppwACQ-qk) and [episode 2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eoU_7Xg3Zzw) - lots of spoilers for The Mandalorian series
"If the consequences of self-awareness are super-powered genocide babies, then maybe it's not worth it."
